tool_description: Implement Authentication as well as Encryption at Application Layer in any Desktop, Mobile and Web Assembly Apps using our Suite Of Authentication APIs
name: HexaEight SSO Platform
title: HexaEight SSO Platform

api_list.name: /fetch-captcha-for-emailid
api_list.description: HexaEight Token Server uses this endpoint to fetch captcha for email address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com/fetch-captcha-for-emailid"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: get-sharedkey-forclientapp
api_list.description: HexaEight Token Issuer uses this endpoint to Fetch an asymmetric shared key for the Client App based on the Client ID for authorized users and resources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com/fetch-dest-clientsk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: fetchauthtoken
api_list.description: Use This EndPoint to fetch the decrypted response  that contains the details of the logged in user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com/fetchauthtoken"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: fetchcookieuser
api_list.description: Use This EndPoint to decrypt the user information contained in a Cookie JWT token
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com/get-cookieuser"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get-new-securetoken
api_list.description: Use This EndPoint to Fetch a SecureToken for your Client Application. This Secure token should be used in the Client Application along with the code challenge for enhanced security of the Client Application.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com/get-new-securetoken"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: extendauthtoken
api_list.description: Use This EndPoint to Extend the expiration of the Authorization token by one hour.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com/extendauthtoken"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get-presharedkey-usingname
api_list.description: Use This EndPoint to Fetch a Shared Key for Destination using Resource Name or Email Address and a UnixTimeStamp.  The unixtimestamp is usually displayed in the Issued at (iat)  header field inside  HexaEight JWT
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com/get-presharedkey-usingname"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hexaeight-sso-platform.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
